actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: To amend title 38, United States Code, so as to provide a special pension program for veterans of World War I.
short_title: Act to Establish a Special Pension Program for World War I Veterans

summary.text: Act to Establish a Special Pension Program for World War I Veterans - Directs the Administrator (effective March 1989, Secretary) of Veterans Affairs to pay (in addition to any pension already paid) a monthly pension of $150 to each veteran of World War I who meets specified service and income requirements.

titles.title: Act to Establish a Special Pension Program for World War I Veterans
To amend title 38, United States Code, so as to provide a special pension program for veterans of World War I.
